column1:
I salute each one of these doctors for risking their lives to save our nation from Corona crisis. 

These martyrs braved adversities & hardships but never gave up. 

My condolences to those who have the honour of calling them their family & friends. https://t.co/cI3t7ehfgu
Whether Noteban , GST or Corona Common Man has always paid price of BJP blunders and lies !
